title: The best analysis you’ll find anywhere on CES 2020 (Ep. 704)
itunes:title: The best analysis you’ll find anywhere on CES 2020
description: Technical analysis may seem confusing… but it doesn’t have to be.  Katie Stockton, founder and managing partner of Fairlead Strategies, LLC, breaks down her methodology... her view on the markets… and a few of her favorite sectors right now. Plus, Frank shares the most exciting trends  from this year’s Consumer Electronics Show… Don’t invest in the tech sector until you listen to this episode... -------------------------------- Enjoyed this episode?
